text_block_list.text: Starting today is the summer training camp- The training camp menu and points to remember are written in a memo that I'm having Sakura Chiyono O look over.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hmm hmm… As expected of Summer Training Camp, it's jam packed with things to do!
choice_data_list: There's more exercise than normal, will you be okay?
There's more exercise than normal, will you be okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Of course! I believe in Trainer-san and this [Trainote]!
choice_data_list: [Trainote]?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Yes! The things I need to get better at, things I can do to increase my abilities… it's all written down in this note!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'm sure, you've read those books you bought before, and taken the time to think up this menu for me…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That's why, this book filled with Trainer-san's feelings is the [Trainote]!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …During this training camp, I'll show you that even if it's just a little bit, I'll grow stronger…!
Sakura Chiyono O's eyes burned with a fierce fighting spirit.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …puha! It's just a little further, to the shore…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Not yet! 10 sets remaining…! [Chiyo walks, Gate In]…!!!

text_block_list.name: Fellow Camp Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey, since we got to training camp, doesn't it seem like Chiyo-chan has gotten pretty intense?

text_block_list.name: Fellow Camp Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, she's putting in a crazy amount of effort. …but both of us, won't lose to her, right?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… Today's menu, is finished~!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: On the way here, it felt like there were alot of people around… Am I… doing something weird?
choice_data_list: No, you're [The Usual] Chiyono.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Okay…? Well if that's the case, then it's fine…
After that, she spent the next few days doing nothing but training- before we knew it, the last day of summer training camp was approaching.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I-is that true?!
choice_data_list: Yeah, looks like your time is better than before camp

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: 0.1 second… Trainer-san and my 0.1 second…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Just a little bit… really just a tiny bit but, I…! I'm getting closer to reaching Maruzen-san…!
choice_data_list: Yeah, I guarantee it!
Yeah, I guarantee it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Yeah! …ehehe.
And so the Summer Training Camp came to a close. And then-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: So they were holding a festival this close by, huh~. Thank you very much for bringing me along!
choice_data_list: It's a reward for working so hard during camp

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. Then, I'm going to enjoy it to the fullest! Cotton Candy, Yo-yos, Goldfish scooping- Ah!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: This puppy plushie, looks alot like Maruzen-san don't you think? Like this fluffiness and these kind-looking eyes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: It's so cute~…! Wanwan, do you want to come home with me, wan?
choice_data_list: I think it looks more like you, though
I think it looks more like you, though

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: L-like me?! That's-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wait, no no no! Nevermind! Ahahaa, Trainer-san you're a funny guy, aren't you?!

text_block_list.name: Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Hey you two, are you interested in this plushie? In that case how about some [mould-cutting]!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Mould-cutting…?

text_block_list.name: Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Mould-cutting is taking this square made of sugar, and using your fingers and this needle to shave and cut out this shape in the middle!

text_block_list.name: Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: If you do it well enough, I'll give you this plushie as a present! How's that? Want to try it out?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Uuu, that plushie has really caught my interest but… it looks a little hard.
choice_data_list: In that case, I'll do it for you!
In that case, I'll do it for you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Eh… Ehhh?!
-And so, for Sakura Chiyono O's sake, I challenged mould-cutting with spirit but, it was alot harder than I thought…

text_block_list.name: Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Oh man! You were close this time, wanna give it another go?
choice_data_list: Yeah! This time for sure…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wait, um, Trainer-san! On the first pass it might be better to use less strength…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Looking at what I've studied before, it's safer to just shave away a little bit around the shape first…
choice_data_list: I see, as expected of Chiyono O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: N-no no! I just saw it before and made a memo of it…! Um… keep fighting!

text_block_list.name: Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Oooh! This time looks good! Wonderful, this plushie is yours now!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I-is it fine for me to accept this…?!
choice_data_list: Yeah, this is also a reward for summer camp
Yeah, this is also a reward for summer camp

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: … Thank you very much…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ehehe~! Your name is [Sakura Wanko O] now~. Wan wan!
choice_data_list: It really is like you
It really is like you

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: T-the only one who thinks that, is probably you Trainer-san…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Ahem! Let's put whether or not it looks like me aside, um… once more, thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Not just for this plushie, but for Summer Training Camp, and before this too-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: You said it before right? That watching me gives you strength, and watching me work hard gives you courage.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …It's the same for me, watching Trainer-san work hard, makes me feel like I have to work hard too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: More so than when I'm alone, I feel more strength. I feel like I can keep pushing forward.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That's why, if both of us keep working hard, I believe we'll definitely get stronger!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'll become Trainer-san's strength, and Trainer-san will become my strength-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And like that, winning the Derby won't stay a dream, and I'll get stronger and stronger…!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …well, um~… A-at least that's what Wanko O thinks, wan…
choice_data_list: I agree with Wanko O
I agree with Wanko O

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ~~~~!! I-I'll definitely fulfill my dream! Even if I have to take a different path from others, even if it takes time, definitely…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: [A late blooming Sakura, is still a Sakura], right?
A firework went up in the distance- almost as if, to affirm Sakura Chiyono O's determination.
